parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
And not, not even, neither?nor. From me and de; but not, not even; in a continued negation, nor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
